data.title: C Programming Challenges
data.summary: C Challenges help you apply your theoretical knowledge to solve various sets of C problems. These challenges will help you develop the programming mindset where you will learn to approach, solve and debut any programming challenges.</br></br>Become master in C Programming by solving 60+ challenges in real-time.

card1.title: Combine learning with practice
card1.desc: Solve 60+ challenges to practice what you have learned in the course.

card2.title: Get certified at the end
card2.desc: Complete the challenges to get the course completion certificate.

rock_paper.title: Rock, Paper & Scissors
rock_paper.desc: You will create a popular game rock paper scissors using the basic concepts of C programming like functions, control flow and input/output.
